title: [Feat]: Company Security policy permits only Edge
body:
### Describe the feature

Client should have Edge as sandbox if it's possible.

### Motivation

Since company now controls my access with intun-portal, only edge is allowed to get to company resources. It would be very nice, that teams client would have edge sandbox or agent somehow, so i can use your great client again. Now i'm stucked with client in edge browser.

Tnx,
Tine

### Alternatives

_No response_

### Additional context

_No response_
